meanings.sent1: The globed lamp cast a soft light in the room.
meanings.sent2: The globed tree stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a globed sun in the corner of the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her globed earrings sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The globed snow globe displayed a miniature winter scene.

meanings.definition: Covered or enclosed in a globe.
meanings.sent1: The globed glass jar held colorful marbles.
meanings.sent2: The globed crystal ball revealed the future.
meanings.sent3: The globed cake was decorated with tiny edible planets.
meanings.sent4: His globed helmet protected him during the space mission.
meanings.sent5: The globed snow globe contained a tiny village within.

meanings.definition: To form into a globe shape.
meanings.sent1: She globed the clay into a perfect sphere.
meanings.sent2: The artist globed the metal into a round sculpture.
meanings.sent3: He globed the dough before baking it into bread.
meanings.sent4: They globed the wire into a circular frame for the project.
meanings.sent5: The potter globed the molten glass into a beautiful vase.
